mapper.select: SELECT c.car_id, c.model_id, c.car_category, c.car_status, c.car_year, c.car_fuel, c.car_grade, c.car_options, c.rental_station, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_seate_num, m.model_transmission, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day, p.parking_id, p.parking_name, p.parking_district FROM car c JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id WHERE p.parking_district = #{district} ORDER BY c.car_id;

SELECT c.car_id, c.car_grade, c.car_category, c.car_status, c.car_options, c.car_fuel, c.car_year, m.model_id, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_transmission, m.model_seate_num, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day, p.parking_id, p.parking_name, p.parking_province, p.parking_district FROM car c LEFT JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id WHERE c.car_id = #{carId};
